title: India and Pakistan both claim victory after ceasefire declared
'Decided to strike where it would hurt': Air Marshal AK Bharti gives details of India's retaliatory strikes on Pakistan airbases
'Decided to strike where it would hurt': Air Marshal AK Bharti gives details of India's retaliatory strikes on Pakistan airbases
'Decided to strike where it would hurt': Air Marshal AK Bharti gives details of India's retaliatory strikes on Pakistan airbases
'Decided to strike where it would hurt': Air Marshal AK Bharti gives details of India's retaliatory strikes on Pakistan airbases
summary: NEW DELHI: In a joint press briefing of defence officials on Sunday, Air Marshal AK Bharti confirmed that Pakistan attempted to breach Indian airspace using its fighter jets in response to Indiaâs cross-border counterterror actions under ' Operation Sindoor'. However, the Indian Air Force successfully repelled the intrusion and downed âa few planes,â inflicting losses on Pakistanâs side. He also reflected on the IAFâs decision to âstrike where it would hurt,â pointing to the targeted assaults on major Pakistani airbases. âTheir planes were prevented from entering inside our border... Definitely, we have downed a few planes... Definitely, there are losses.

title: Drone activity spotted in Barmer, blackout ordered
summary: With drone activity spotted in Rajasthan's Barmer on Sunday night again, the district administration has ordered a complete blackout. Earlier in the day, blackout was imposed in Jaisalmer, Barmer and other border areas in Rajasthan as a precautionary measure in the wake of Saturday's ceasefire violation by Pakistan. According to the details, compiled by news agency PTI, the measure was put in place in Barmer at 8 pm, while it started at 7.30 pm in Jaisalmer. Precautionary sirens amid complete blackout can be heard in Barmer. On Saturday night, panic was triggered in the border areas after the terms of an understanding between India and Pakistan to stop all military actions were violated by the neighbouring country. The normal activities resumed on Sunday and markets reopened. Among other details, the North Western Railway (NWR) also restored the train services that were cancelled or partially cancelled on Saturday due to the.

title: Drone activity spotted in Barmer, blackout ordered
summary: Con la actividad de los drones vistos en Rajasthan's Barmer el domingo por la noche nuevamente, la administración del distrito ordenó un apagón completo. Temprano en el día, el apagón se impuso en Jaisalmer, Barmer y otras áreas fronterizas en Rajasthan como una medida de precaución a raíz de la violación del alto el fuego del sábado por Pakistán. Según los detalles, compilados por la agencia de noticias PTI, la medida se implementó en Barmer a las 8 pm, mientras que comenzó a las 7.30 pm en Jaisalmer. Las sirenas de precaución en medio del apagón completo se pueden escuchar en Barmer. El sábado por la noche, Panic se activó en las áreas fronterizas después de los términos de.

title: Shashi Tharoor not among Congress nominees for all-party delegations, Rahul Gandhi's party hits out at Centre again
summary: The Congress hit out at the government on Saturday after the latter allegedly selected only one out of four nominees suggested by the party to be part of diplomatic delegations. It's reported that 51 political leaders, parliamentarians, and former ministers from across party lines will be part of the seven delegations travelling to world capitals to promote India's resolve to tackle terrorism against the backdrop of Operation Sindoor. Congress leader Jairam Ramesh said in a post X on Saturday that on the morning of May 16, "the Modi govt asked for four names of Congress MPs/leaders to represent the INC.

title: कांग्रेस ने एस जयशंकर पर लगाए आरोप, विदेश मंत्रालय ने दी सफाई, कहा- ऑपरेशन सिंदूर के...
summary: कांग्रेस ने एस जयशंकर पर लगाए आरोप, विदेश मंत्रालय ने दी सफाई, कहा- ऑपरेशन सिंदूर के... विदेश मंत्रालय ने कहा, "विदेश मंत्री डॉ. एस जयशंकर ने कहा था कि हमने पाकिस्तान को शुरुआत में ही चेतावनी दे दी थी, जो स्पष्ट रूप से ऑपरेशन सिंदूर के शुरू होने के बाद का प्रारंभिक चरण है." लोकसभा में नेता विपक्ष और कांग्रेस सांसद राहुल गांधी ने शनिवार (17 मई, 2025) विदेश मंत्री एस जयशंकर के एक बयान के हवाले से केंद्र सरकार पर निशाना साधा. वहीं, कांग्रेस नेता जयराम रमेश ने एस जयशंकर पर देश को धोखा देने का आरोप लगाते हुए.

title: ब्रह्मोस मिसाइल किसी दूसरे देश को क्यों नहीं बेच सकता है भारत? ये है वजह
summary: ब्रह्मोस मिसाइल किसी दूसरे देश को क्यों नहीं बेच सकता है भारत? ये है वजह पाकिस्तान में ब्रह्मोस के तबाही भरे कारनामे ने दुनिया को दिखा दिया है कि भारत अब विदेशी रक्षा उत्पादों पर ही निर्भर नहीं है, बल्कि वह देश में बने हथियारों से भी दुश्मन को धूल चटा सकता है. भारत और पाकिस्तान के बीच बीते दिनों हुए सैन्य संघर्ष में दुनिया ने भारत के रक्षा उत्पादों की ताकत देखी थी. भारत ने पाकिस्तान पर 15 ब्रह्मोस मिसाइल दागीं, जिन्होंने 11 एयरबेसों को तबाह कर दिया था. सुपरसोनिक क्रूज मिसाइल ब्रह्मोस के इस तबाही भरे कारनामे ने.

title: Nifty In Technical Charts: Is FOMO Back, Looks Like
summary: MarketsNifty In Technical Charts: Is FOMO Back, Looks Like ADVERTISEMENT Nifty In Technical Charts: Is FOMO Back, Looks Like People sitting on cash are slowly getting into FOMO status, and this may lead to some buying briskness, an example of which was seen in the defence stocks over the last couple of weeks. Good activity is seen in the small- and mid-cap space, though, as people scramble to get on board what seems like a missed rally. (Photo Source: Envato) It's been quite a difficult market of late. summary: ब्रह्मोस मिसाइल किसी दूसरे देश को क्यों नहीं बेच सकता है भारत? ये है वजह पाकिस्तान में ब्रह्मोस के तबाही भरे कारनामे ने दुनिया को दिखा दिया है कि भारत अब विदेशी रक्षा उत्पादों पर ही निर्भर नहीं है, बल्कि वह देश में बने हथियारों से भी दुश्मन को धूल चटा सकता है. भारत और पाकिस्तान के बीच बीते दिनों हुए सैन्य संघर्ष में दुनिया ने भारत के रक्षा उत्पादों की ताकत देखी थी. भारत ने पाकिस्तान पर 15 ब्रह्मोस मिसाइल दागीं, जिन्होंने 11 एयरबेसों को तबाह कर दिया था. सुपरसोनिक क्रूज मिसाइल ब्रह्मोस के इस तबाही भरे कारनामे ने.

title: 'Pakistan में कोई भी सेना पर..' -India-Pakistan तनाव के बीच Sudhanshu Trivedi का बड़ा बयान |ABP News
summary: Explorer 'Any army in Pakistan ..' -India -pakistan is a big statement by Sudhanshu Trivedi amidst stress. ABP News Open BJP leader Sudhanshu Trivedi on India-Pakistan tension said, "Operation vermilion is going on. In a case, Pakistan is in a strong position with us that no army is raising questions in Pakistan. Many leaders are raising questions in India. None of Pakistan's people are being coated in the media of India. Big leaders of India are being coated. News 'Any army in Pakistan ..' -India -pakistan is a big statement by Sudhanshu Trivedi amidst stress. ABP News Acharya Pramod said.
